form.temsIdDescription: The unique identifier you've given to the item, like LPB002
form.serialNumberDescription: The serial number assigned to the item by it's manufacturer

equipment.priceDescription: The price can be overwritten equipments having this definition

user.emailNotificationsDescription: The email address is primarily used for account recovering. If you desire, you can recieve notifications too.

personnel.name: Name
personnel.phoneNumberDescription: It might be used in the future for sending SMS
personnel.emailDescription: It will be used for sending E-mails

property.name: Name
property.nameDescription: The name that will be used by the system for building objects. No spaces or other special charaters allowed!
property.displayNameDescription: The name that will be displayed
property.descriptionDescription: Description of this property will appear like this

key.identifierDescription: A short name for this key, like 214

definition.childIdentifierDescription: Name associated with this definition (If the desired definition already exists, select it from dropdown)

authentication.askAdministrator: If you don't have an account, ask system administrator.
